summary: The diff shows comprehensive implementation of most requirements including updated About section, removal of Industrial Battery, addition of Telecom Battery, splitting of Inverter products, six benefits in Why Choose EVRON section, and green color scheme updates. However, the actual generated image assets and logo implementation are not visible in the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Design and generate a new EVRON logo featuring two symmetrical green leaves (#2ecc71) that form a subtle 'V' shape representing growth and energy, using a bold modern sans-serif font, with a minimal eco-friendly corporate aesthetic
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of logo image generation or creation in the diff. While frontend-file-summaries.txt mentions the logo concept, no actual logo file generation is shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render all generated product images and brand assets (logo, product images for EV Battery, Solar Battery, Telecom Battery, Inverter 2KW, Inverter 3KW) as static files in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows image paths referenced in ProductsSection.tsx but does not show the actual generation or addition of any image files in frontend/public/assets/generated. No ADDED FILES section contains these assets, and no image generation code or files are visible.
